thread.title: Tallahassee, FL

author: Tallahassee, FL
title: Tallahassee, FL
text: I found a slightly lower price on another site, but the shipping would take up to 2 weeks longer and they charged tax, so it was an easy decision. These are great bulbs and we have 14 in our kitchen in 4" recessed cans. Two were blown out by a near lightning strike, and I replaced them with Sylvanias. The Sylvanias take longer to come on and blink and dim when our 60 amp tankless electric water heater comes on. So am now replacing them with the TCP brand
